item.title: Unit testing in SSDT â€“ a quick intro
item.description: This post will give you a quick run-through of adding tSQLt to an existing database project destined for Azure SQL DB. This basically covers unit testing in SSDT and there is a lot of excellent info out there, so this focuses on getting you through the initial setup as quickly as possible. This post most especially relies on the information Ed Elliot and Ken Ross have published, so do check them out for more info on this topic!
